pages.text: 反思步骤是升华中与精神层面关系最为密切的步骤。它完全由$(marked)冥想$()构成。$(br2)开启这一步骤，你需要在$(marked)狂喜$()状态下进入到$(marked)恍惚$()之中。$(br)狂喜有着不可思议的力量，你可以通过饮下$(l:alchemy/entry_wine)$(item)殷红之酒$()获得这种状态。

要想继续下一步骤，I will need to apply a certain emotion to myself and then meditate。I will learn what to feel next once I am in the state of rethinking。$(br2)If I want to be prepared completely，I'll need to be able to feel $(o)right$() at all times.
